1 /**
  2  * Cloud code only APIs.
  3  * All of these APIs are not implemented in client sdk,
  4  * we put them here to generate API docs.
  5  */
  6 (function(root) {
  7   root.AV = root.AV || {};
  8   /**
  9    * Contains all AV API classes and functions.
 10    * @name AV
 11    * @namespace
 12    *
 13    * Contains all AV API classes and functions.
 14    */
 15   var AV = root.AV;
 16 
 17   /*
 18    * @class A Request object that is passed into the afterDelete function.
 19    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 20    * @property {AV.Object} object The object that was deleted.
 21    * @property {AV.User} user If set, the user that made the request.
 22    */
 23    AV.Cloud.AfterDeleteRequest = function(){};
 24 
 25   /**
 26    * @class A Request object that is passed into the afterSave function.
 27    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 28    * @property {AV.Object} object The object that was saved.
 29    * @property {AV.User} user If set, the user that made the request.
 30    */
 31    AV.Cloud.AfterSaveRequest = function(){};
 32 
 33   /**
 34    * @class A Request object that is passed into the beforeSave function.
 35    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 36    * @property {AV.Object} object The object that is being saved.
 37    * @property {AV.User} user If set, the user that made the request.
 38    */
 39    AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveRequest = function(){};
 40 
 41   /**
 42    * @class A Request object that is passed into the beforeDelete function.
 43    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 44    * @property {AV.Object} object The object that is being deleted.
 45    * @property {AV.User} user If set, the user that made the request.
 46    */
 47    AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteRequest = function(){};
 48 
 49   /**
 50    * @class A Request object that is passed into the afterUpdate function.
 51    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 52    * @property {AV.Object} object The object that was updated.
 53    * @property {AV.User} user If set, the user that made the request.
 54    */
 55    AV.Cloud.AfterUpdateRequest = function(){};
 56 
 57   /**
 58    * Define a timer will wait a specified number of seconds, and
 59    * then execute a specified function, and it will continue to execute the function,
 60    * once at every given time-interval. <br/>
 61    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 62    * For example:
 63    * <pre> <code>
 64    *       //Log every second.
 65    *       AV.Cloud.setInterval("timer1", 1, function(){
 66    *           consooe.log("timer1 log");
 67    *       });
 68    * </code></pre>
 69    * @param name The timer's unique identifier.
 70    * @param interval The length of the time-intervals between each execution in seconds.
 71    * @param func The function to be executed.
 72    */
 73    AV.Cloud.setInterval = function(name, interval, func) {};
 74 
 75   /**
 76    * Define a timer that will execute by the crontab-like expression.<br/>
 77    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 78    * <pre> <code>
 79    *       //Log at 1:00 AM everyday.
 80    *       AV.Cloud.cronJob("timer1", "0 1 * * * ?", function(){
 81    *           consooe.log("timer1 log");
 82    *       });
 83    * </code></pre>
 84    * @param name The timer's unique identifier.
 85    * @param cron The crontab-like string in the form of 'sec min hour dayOfMonth month dayOfWeek [year]'.
 86    * @param func The function to be executed.
 87    */
 88    AV.Cloud.cronJob = function(name, cron, func) {};
 89 
 90 
 91   /**
 92    * @class A Response object that is passed to the beforeSave function. This object contains functions to tell the AV.Cloud what to do with the save.
 93    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
 94    * @property {Function} success If called, will allow the save to happen. If a AV.Object is passed in, then the passed in object will be saved instead.
 95    * @property {Function} error If called, will reject the save. An optional error message may be passed in.
 96    */
 97    AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveResponse = function(){};
 98 
 99   /**
100    * @class A Response object that is passed to the beforeDelete function. This object contains functions to tell the AV.Cloud what to do with the delete.
101    * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
102    * @property {Function} success If called, will allow the delete to happen. If a AV.Object is passed in, then the passed in object will be deleted instead.
103    * @property {Function} error If called, will reject the delete. An optional error message may be passed in.
104    */
105    AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteResponse = function(){};
106 
107    /**
108     * @class A Request object that is passed into a cloud function.
109     * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
110     * @property {Object} params The params passed to the cloud function
111     * @property {AV.User} user If set, the user that made the request.
112     */
113    AV.Cloud.FunctionRequest = function(){};
114 
115    /**
116     * @class A Response object that is passed to a cloud function. This object contains functions to tell the AV.Cloud what to do with the save.
117     * <strong>Available in Cloud Code only.</strong>
118     * @property {Function} success If success is called, will return a successful response with the optional argument to the caller.
119     * @property {Function} error f error is called, will return an error response with an optionally passed message.
120     */
121    AV.Cloud.FunctionResponse = function(){};
122 
123    /**
124     * Registers a before save function.
125     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
126     * <code><pre>
127    AV.Cloud.beforeSave('MyCustomClass', function(request, response) {
128    // code here
129  })
130 
131  AV.Cloud.beforeSave(AV.User, function(request, response) {
132    // code here
133  })
134     * </pre></code>
135     * @param {Class} name The AV.Object subclass to register the before save function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
136     * @param {Function} func The function to run before a save. This function should take two parameters a AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveRequest and a AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveResponse.
137     */
138    AV.Cloud.beforeSave = function(name, func){};
139 
140    /**
141     * Registers an after save function.
142     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
143     * <code><pre>
144  AV.Cloud.afterSave('MyCustomClass', function(request) {
145      // code here
146     })
147 
148  AV.Cloud.afterSave(AV.User, function(request) {
149    // code here
150  })
151     * </pre></code>
152     * @param {Class} name The AV.Object subclass to register the after save function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
153     * @param {Function} func The function to run after a save. This function should take just one parameter AV.Cloud.AfterSaveRequest.
154     */
155    AV.Cloud.afterSave = function(name, func){};
156 
157 
158    /**
159     * Registers an after update function.
160     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
161     * <code><pre>
162  AV.Cloud.afterUpdate('MyCustomClass', function(request) {
163      // code here
164     })
165 
166  AV.Cloud.afterUpdate(AV.User, function(request) {
167    // code here
168  })
169     * </pre></code>
170     * @param {Class} name The AV.Object subclass to register the after update function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
171     * @param {Function} func The function to run after a update. This function should take just one parameter AV.Cloud.AfterUpdateRequest.
172     */
173    AV.Cloud.afterUpdate = function(name, func){};
174 
175 
176    /**
177     * Registers a before delete function.
178     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
179     * If you want use beforeDelete for a predefined class in the AV JavaScript SDK (e.g. AV.User), you should pass the class itself and not the String for arg1.
180     * <code><pre>
181  AV.Cloud.beforeDelete('MyCustomClass', function(request, response) {
182     // code here
183   })
184 
185   AV.Cloud.beforeDelete(AV.User, function(request, response) {
186     // code here
187   })
188     * </pre></code>
189     * @param {Class} arg1 The AV.Object subclass to register the before delete function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
190     * @param {Function} func The function to run before a delete. This function should take two parameters a AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteRequest and a AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteResponse
191     */
192    AV.Cloud.beforeDelete = function(name, func){};
193 
194    /**
195     * Registers an after delete function.
196     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
197     * If you want to use afterDelete for a predefined class in the AV JavaScript SDK (e.g. AV.User), you should pass the class itself and not the String for arg1.
198     * <code><pre>
199  AV.Cloud.afterDelete('MyCustomClass', function(request) {
200     // code here
201   })
202 
203   AV.Cloud.afterDelete(AV.User, function(request) {
204     // code here
205   })
206     * </pre></code>
207     * @param {Class} arg1 The AV.Object subclass to register the before save function for. This can instead be a String that is the className of the subclass.
208     * @param {Function} func The function to run before a save. This function should take just one parameter, AV.Cloud.AfterDeleteRequest.
209     */
210    AV.Cloud.afterDelete = function(name, func){};
211 
212    /**
213     * Registers an on-login function.
214     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
215     * If you want to use onLogin for an user in the AV JavaScript SDK, you should pass the function:
216     * <code><pre>
217   AV.Cloud.onLogin(function(request, response) {
218     // code here
219   });
220     * </pre></code>
221     * @param {Function} func The function to run before an user signin. This function should take two parameters a AV.Cloud.FunctionRequest and a AV.Cloud.FunctionResponse.
222     */
223    AV.Cloud.onLogin = function(func) {};
224 
225    /**
226     * Makes an HTTP Request.
227     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
228     * @param {Object} The options objects that makes the request.
229     * @return {AV.Promise}  A promise that will be resolved with a AV.Cloud.HTTPResponse object when the request completes.
230     */
231    AV.Cloud.httpRequest = function(options) {};
232 
233    /**
234     * @namespace
235     * Express middleware for AV.User session management through a signed browser cookie.
236     * This API is LeanCloud-specific, and not included in the original Express API.
237     * See <a href="https://leancloud.cn/docs/cloud_code_guide.html#处理用户登录和登出">Cloud Code Guide</a> for details.
238     * <br/><strong>Available in Cloud Code only</strong>.
239     * @param {String} options.cookie Optional.
240     *                 Standard cookie options for the LeanCloud user session cookie.
241     *                 For your application's security, we ignore the httpOnly, signed flags in cookie options,
242     *                 and always set these to true for the cookie generated by this middleware.
243     * @param {Boolean} options.fetchUser Optional,Default: false.
244 	*                 Whether to fetch the full current LeanCloud user object on each request.
245     *                 Setting this to true results in one extra LeanCloud API request during each Express request. If you set this false,
246     *                 ACLs will still work when you query for objects the current user is allowed to see,
247     *                 but you cannot access any fields on the current user object (except id) until you manually call AV.User.current().fetch().
248     * @param {String} options.key Optional, Default: 'avos.sess'
249     *                 Cookie name for storing the LeanCloud user session.
250     */
251    avosExpressCookieSession = function(options) { };
252 
253    /**
254     * @namespace
255     * Express middleware for redirecting the user to the HTTPS endpoint with the same URL.
256     * This API is LeanCloud-specific, and not included in the original Express API.
257     * See <a href="https://leancloud.cn/docs/cloud_code_guide.html#启用https">Cloud Code Guide</a> for details.
258     */
259    avosExpressHttpsRedirect = function() {};
260 
261 })(this)
262
